page.title: 16Transport
page.content: Heliport. In early 1985 there opened a new passenger service between Holyhead and Ireland.The idea was that businessmen could have a faster link between Dublin and London if they took air transport from Dublin to Holyhead and then by train to London.However ther weren't enough passengers and the venture was abandoned after only afew months. The heliport and all its buildings are still standing in the Holyhead industrial estate.Ther is no sign that a new company will be taking up the venture in the future.
